description: The function is vulnerable because it makes a HTTP request to an external server. This can lead to Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Information (CWE-319) as the data is not encrypted and can be intercepted by attackers. Additionally, if an attacker can control the URL, it could lead to Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) (CWE-918), where the attacker can make the server perform requests that it should not be able to.
